alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Central Mountains, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sanpete Valley, Sevier Valley and Western Millard and Juab Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
